Class RecordDataHelper

extends java.lang.Object
    This class extend DatabaseHelper and mainly handle records data

      (package private) void queryHistoryLocation(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.Integer limit, OnGetRecordDataListener listener)
      This method will query for all records that the user is a rider to obtain selected locations in the past and sort them by date and time of the record in descending order.

      • queryHistoryLocation

        void queryHistoryLocation(java.lang.String userName,
                          java.lang.Integer limit,
                          OnGetRecordDataListener listener)
        This method will query for all records that the user is a rider to obtain selected locations in the past and sort them by date and time of the record in descending order.

        listener - listener for notification
